text: Marsiling MRT station (NS8) is an above-ground Mass Rapid Transit (MRT) station on the North South Line in Woodlands, Singapore. It opened on 10 February 1996. It was first named Woodlands West Station. ==Former Codes== From 1996-2001 the code for Marsiling Station was N18. ==References== ==Related pages== *Mass Rapid Transit (Singapore) Category:Mass Rapid Transit (Singapore) stations Category:1996 establishments in Asia Category:20th- century establishments in Singapore Category:Woodlands, Singapore
title: Marsiling MRT station
